Sync Your Employees with Coursetto

BambooHR Account Setup

Divisions and Departments

Before connecting to Coursetto, it is incredibly helpful to slot employees in Divisions and Departments correctly. A big part of Coursetto is the ability to create courses for particular division or departments individually. Marketers can take marketing courses and engineers can take engineering courses.

Divisions and Branches will populate with users from your company's BambooHR account. An email invite will be sent to any active employees who are not already in Coursetto.

Requirements

  • Employees must have an email, either work or home.
  • Only active BambooHR employees will sync with Coursetto.

Linking BambooHR to Coursetto

Find Your BambooHR API Key

  • Log into your BambooHR Account
  • Click your profile image in the top right
  • Click "Keys"
  • If a key does not exist click "Add a new key"
  • Copy the key, it will be the long string of numbers and letters

Inserting Your BambooHR Key Into Coursetto

  • Login to your Coursetto account
  • Click "People"
  • Click the "BambooHR" logo in the top right
  • Paste you BambooHR key into the proper field
  • Enter your BambooHR subdomain

Pressing Sync to BambooHR

Users who are not already in Coursetto will be sent an email invite and will have the set authorization. Please check the appropriate boxes for all new invites to be authorized to do as you wish.

Authorization

By default all authorization is turned off, which means all new invites will not be able to do anything in Coursetto but take the courses designated to them. If you trust your employees enough, empower them to do more.

You can edit users authorization individually in their profile page after you sync to allow users to do things like edit courses.

And That's It!

You can sync as many times as you'd like after. New employees will get invited and already imported users will get updated with the latest images, name, divisions, and department with every sync.
